categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith actors

nodes.text: Wayne Pygram (born October 13, 1959) is an Australian actor portrayed Wilhuff Tarkin briefly in Revenge of the Sith. He was noted for his almost uncanny resemblance to original actor Peter Cushing. He is mainly known for his dual role of Scorpius and Harvey on the space opera TV show Farscape (1999-2004).
